Bash(git commit -m "$(cat <<''EOF''
feat: Add automated LLM evaluation system with multi-judge consensus

Implement comprehensive automated evaluation system supporting both
objective and creative prompts with real-time progress tracking.

New Features:
- Multi-judge consensus scoring (Claude Opus 4.5, GPT-5.2, Gemini 3 Pro)
- Objective vs creative evaluation modes with semantic matching
- Async job queue with 3 concurrent workers
- Real-time WebSocket progress updates
- Encrypted API key management (AES-256-GCM)
- Cost tracking and threshold alerts

Architecture:
- Python LiteLLM service (FastAPI) with 3 AI judges
- Go evaluation orchestrator with job queue
- WebSocket broadcasts for progress/completion/alerts
- SQLite schema extensions (5 new tables, 7 indexes)

Database Changes:
- Add ''type'' field to prompts (objective/creative)
- New tables: settings, evaluation_jobs, model_responses,
  evaluation_history, cost_tracking
- Encrypted API key storage

API Endpoints:
- /settings - Configure API keys and thresholds
- /evaluate/all - Evaluate all models × all prompts
- /evaluate/model - Evaluate one model × all prompts
- /evaluate/prompt - Evaluate all models × one prompt
- /evaluation/progress - Get job status
- /evaluation/cancel - Cancel running job

Files Created (26):
- python_service/ (13 files: FastAPI server, judges, evaluators)
- evaluator/ (5 files: orchestrator, job queue, consensus)
- middleware/encryption.go, settings.go
- handlers/evaluation.go, settings.go
- templates/settings.html
- AUTOMATED_EVALUATION_SETUP.md

Cost: ~$0.05 per evaluation (3 judges)
Example: 10 models × 42 prompts = $21
EOF
